title: Ideogram 2
subtitle: Ideogram 2.0 is a new State of the Art AI image model with enhanced capabilities, developed by Ideogram AI and now available on BasedLabs AI.

how_to_step1_content: From the dropdown menu, choose Ideogram 2.0. This latest version offers improved image quality and text rendering.
how_to_step2_content: In the text field, describe your desired image in detail. Include specifics about style, composition, and any text you want to appear. For example: "A sleek smartphone displaying the Ideogram app interface, floating above a cityscape at sunset."
how_to_step3_content: Click the "Generate" button. The AI will process your prompt, which may take a few moments. Once complete, your image will appear on screen. You can then download it in your preferred format or regenerate with adjusted prompts if needed.
feature1_content: Ideogram 2.0 produces highly realistic images with improved textures and lifelike details. The model excels in rendering human features, landscapes, and complex scenes that closely resemble photographs.
feature2_content: The new model significantly enhances text rendering in images, allowing for accurate creation of designs with long, stylized text. This feature is particularly useful for producing marketing materials, posters, and social media content.
feature3_content: Users can prompt multiple pre-defined styles including Realistic, Design, 3D, and Anime. The model also offers precise color palette control, allowing for consistent brand representation or specific artistic choices in generated images.

title: Ambigram Generator
